languages.text: Enemies attacking this creature in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} or gain {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.
languages.original_text: Противники, атакующие это существо в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g}, должны выполнить {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала получить эффект {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g} на 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Enemies attacking this creature in melee must pass a Willpower resistance test or gain burning for 2 rounds.

Enemies attacking this creature in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} or gain {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

Enemies attacking this creature in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} or gain {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

languages.text: Los enemigos que atacan a esta criatura en {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} o sufrir {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} durante 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}.
languages.original_text: Enemies attacking this creature in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} or gain {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Los enemigos que atacan a esta criatura en cuerpo a cuerpo deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de fortaleza de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} o sufrir {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} durante 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}.

languages.text: 使用{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}攻击此生物的攻击者需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，若攻击者未能通过检定，会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}状态，持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
languages.original_text: Enemies attacking this creature in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} or gain {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 使用近战攻击此生物的攻击者需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，若攻击者未能通过检定，会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}状态，持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。

languages.text: Les ennemis qui attaquent cette créature en {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g} doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}résistance{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g}, faute de quoi ils subissent l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} pendant 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.
languages.original_text: Enemies attacking this creature in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} or gain {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Les ennemis qui attaquent cette créature en mêlée doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de résistance lié à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g} ou ils subissent l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} pendant 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

languages.text: Feinde, die diese Kreatur im {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampf{/g} attackieren, müssen eine {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} bestehen, um nicht 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} lang mit {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g} belegt zu werden.
languages.original_text: Enemies attacking this creature in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} or gain {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Feinde, die diese Kreatur im Kampf attackieren, müssen eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Widerstandsprobe{/g} bestehen, sonst erleiden sie{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g}, 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} lang.

languages.text: この生物に{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接{/g}で攻撃した敵は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}抵抗判定{/g}に失敗した場合、 2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}する。

traits.locale_text: この生物に近接で攻撃した敵は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}抵抗{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に失敗した場合、 2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}する。
